00036 using namespace std;
00037 using namespace boost;

00039 
00040 DiscreteRandomGenerator *
00041 DiscreteRandomGeneratorFactory::create(const String &spec) {
00042   vector<String> args;
00043   String name;
00044 
00045   split(args, spec, is_any_of("\t "));
00046 
00047   if (!args.empty()) {
00048     name = args.front();
00049     args.erase(args.begin());
00050   }
00051 
00052   if (name == "uniform")
00053     return new DiscreteRandomGeneratorUniform();
00054   else if (name == "zipf") {
00055     if (args.empty())
00056       return new DiscreteRandomGeneratorZipf();
00057     if (starts_with(args[0], "--s=")) {
00058       String s_str = args[0].substr(4);
00059       double s_val;
00060       s_val = strtod(s_str.c_str(), 0);
00061       return new DiscreteRandomGeneratorZipf(s_val);
00062     }
00063   }
00064   
00065   HT_FATALF("Unrecognized distribution (%s)", name.c_str());
00066 
00067   return 0;
00068 }
